This property verifies that signal A is assigned to 0 one clock cycle after the active-high reset signal Rst is asserted. 

The property triggers on every rising edge of the clock signal Clk when the reset signal Rst equals 1. When this condition occurs, the property requires that on the very next clock cycle (one Clk cycle later), signal A must equal 0. The property is disabled and not checked when the reset signal Rst equals 0.
